entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonConverter.Read call inside another converter throws InvalidOperationException: Cannot skip tokens on partial JSON. #74108
  • Cannot run .NET Core 3.1 apps in directories that end in dot on macOS #74105
  • Native build on s390x broken after PR #72394 #74102
  • Add support for running pipelines on PRs, with *arguments* #74096
  • When I use the IP the remote server refuse connection #74093
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf`: `wasm-opt` failing with `unexpected expression typeemcc`, and killed with `SIGSEGV (-11)` #74088
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-runtime-perf][wasm] `Perf_File.CopyToOverwrite` benchmark failing with `System.IO.IOException: File exists` #74104
  • [API Proposal]: password bytes PKCS8 PEM exports #74085
    8.0.0
  • Environment variable for summary of JIT info output to console #74084
    Future
  • OSR + dynamic PGO not optimizing interface dispatch as expected #74081
    8.0.0
  • Impersonation via Kerberos and HttpClient leads to TCP port exhaustion #74078
  • Test failures on runtime-extra-platforms on Android/iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #74076
    8.0.0
  • Missing risc-v implementations in mono mini #74071
    8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Crash related to stack unwinding while running System.Runtime test case #74069
  • Default AssemblyLoadContext resolves assembly on the 2nd attempt #74068
  • MakeNewCustomDelegate is not supported by NativeAOT #74067
  • Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream #74066
  • Nullability annotation missing on CacheControlHeaderValue.TryParse #74061
  • cannot open include file 'version_info.h' #74060
  • There is a delay bug in serial communication #74063
    Future
  • System.Data.Odbc.OdbcException (0x80131937): ERROR [0] #74059
  • F5 to run Blazor WebAssembly App project, register and log in on the web page, then log out, click login again, the web page will be crash. #74064
  • [ppc64le] New test RegexPcre2Tests added in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests testsuite is failing #74057
  • System.Threading.Ratelimiting does not effectively maximize requests for its parameters #74056
  • Quic Connect fails with weird error when connecting to IPv6 and AF not available #74053
  • System.Resources.ResourceManager is not thread safe when ignore case is enabled #74052
    Future
  • NetworkStream.BeginWrite has different buffer usage safety on Windows and Linux #74050
  • crash in JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on Mono #74049
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\CodeGenBringUpTests\\DivConst_r\\DivConst_r.cmd #74044
  • Question: finding architecture using System.Reflection.Metadata #74040

Closed

  • Provide API XmlDsigC14NTransform.GetCanonicalBytes without need for hashalgorithm #21388
    Future
  • Feedback on ClaimsPrincipal handling of arrays and complex types #19578
    Future
  • Cross-Architecture publish user experience should be better #71395
    7.0.0
  • [Regression] System.Diagnostics.ActivityLink Equals broken in net7 preview #74026
    7.0.0
  • Remove dotnet8 feeds from NuGet.config when dependencies publish into dotnet9 feeds #74100
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Ensure subtleCrypto is usable from Blazor app #72810
    8.0.0
  • AOT+LLVM throws for `Enum.GetUnderlyingType()` on Android in .NET 7 #68914
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.RandomAccess_GetLength.ReturnsActualLengthForDevices(options: Asynchronous) #73925
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\Arm\\AdvSimd.Arm64\\AdvSimd.Arm64_Part2_r\\AdvSimd.Arm64_Part2_r.cmd #65281
    7.0.0
  • Libraries Infrastructure and Tools work planned for .NET 7 #65260
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] MsQuic packaging #55639
    7.0.0
  • Provide a way to disable using subtle crypto on WebAssembly for the .NET crypto APIs #73386
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests failed in CI #60933
    7.0.0
  • Deserialize a JSON string with the property name had no quotes #74055
  • marshalling va_list crossplatform p/invoke binding #9316
    Future
  • Visual Studio 2022 Remote Testing -.NET Framework 4.8 is installed, yet the.NET cannot be found during testing. #73940
  • Accessing physical drives throws when accessing from the end and retrieving .Length #73669
    7.0.0
  • Vectorize the new {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept methods #67942
    8.0.0
  • Runtime silent installation progress #58307
  • bash: dotnet: command not found (.NET 6 installed on CentOS 7) #62208
  • Updating to the latest DF build (17.0.0 Preview 5 31801.437.main) results in broken .NET Core 3.1 component #66456
  • Issue using `dotnet trace` on MacCatalyst apps #73715
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorOf<*>.* has Regressed for Mono Interpreter Ubuntu 18.04 #73863
  • [mono] mono crash on ios #68849
    7.0.0
  • When I try to create a handler in the client for a gRPC service HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates is null #73960
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Data #73722
    7.0.0
  • Compile error in TypeUtilTests.cs: The type 'Uri' exists in both System.Private.Uri and System.Runtime #73792
    7.0.0
  • UInt128 implicit casting #74001
  • Mono runtime allows running module ctor and class ctors multiple times through reflection #40351
    8.0.0
  • [net7][Wasm] Type.TypeInitializer.Invoke() does not run the type initializer #69516
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for issue 70330 #74112
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Don't track current field of state machines #74111
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert #70171 "Ensure that GT_CNS_VEC is handled in ..." #74110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix .net 6 framework packs to not have different names or aliases as that's not required or supported. #74109
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Set configureplatform.make prerelease to 0 #74103
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move dotnet7 feeds to dotnet8 in main nuget.config #74101
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add scheduled runs for release/7.0* on community architectures #74099
    area-Build-mono, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add Arm64 PGO/IBC to Windows and Linux builds #74098
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing performance pipeline fix #74097
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add a missing AssertMapAndKeyExist to repGetExactClasses #74095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't fail the test when the file is in use #74094
    area-System.IO
  • [mono] fix Android sample AOT=true build #74092
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix auto layout algorithm to compute structure alignment correctly #74091
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improve JitDisasm for top-level statements, expose DumpJittedMethods in Release #74090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #68906 enable android x86 double related issues #74080
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix gtGetClassHandle for static fields (R2R only) #74075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • #52851 Enable/ Skip test case on MacCatalyst #74070
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Set CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Checked in corehost #74065
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Ppc64le] bug fixes #74058
    community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74045
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert more jit phases to opt into common post phase checks #74041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for `$(PublishAot)` #74038
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • [release/7.0-rc1] perf pipeline: Switch to node 14.x #74089
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Vectorize {Last}IndexOf{Any}{Except} without code duplication #74086
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • perf pipeline: Switch to node 14.x #74017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Handle endianness for character tests #74082
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Don't fail the test when the file is in use #74083
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add Arm64 PGO/IBC to Windows and Linux builds #73973
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SuperPMI collection fix by instantiating 'GetExactClasses' if it is null #74037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] amend the tests' building on LA64. #73840
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix auto layout algorithm to compute structure alignment correctly #73738
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests failed in CI #73170
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • [armel/Tizen] Skip host from cross-build #73625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Workload changes - account for SDK bands and use archives #74054
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] The `conv_ovf_i8_i.ilproj` is not supported the LA64. #74051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #74047
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [mono] Implement missing functionality for cctor invocation #74043
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Add missing .npmrc in sample #74039
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't set PublishAot in SDK by default #74048
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    area-System.Memory
  • Reword backport bot message #74077
  • Don't set PublishAot in SDK by default #74046
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove project dependency in System.Configuration.Tests.csproj #74016
    area-System.Configuration, test-bug
  • Add support for "known errors" to Fuzzlyn pipeline #73938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make FileInfo/DirectoryInfo.Name lazy #73983
    area-System.IO
  • Remove reflection from AppHostUpdateTests #73988
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [mono] Implement missing functionality for cctor invocation #73955
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Bump main branding to 8.0 #73985
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #74024
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm][debugger] Hide members from classes that don't have debug information #74029
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Use buffer.Length as the source of truth for ReadDirectoryChanges' nBufferLength #74023
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Disable the ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success test for NativeAOT #74019
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Add missing .npmrc in sample #74031
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    community-contribution
  • Add jit stress random #73859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74002
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add JSON Int128 and UInt128 support #73892
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignore LoopbackServer exceptions in MaxHeadersLength test #73937
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • Try to keep cache value after startup validation when current Options is default unnamed one #72927
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Move X.509 certificate tests under S.S.Cryptography #74033
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Skip assertion list look ups where unnecessary #73142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix nullable annotations on generic math interfaces #74025
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Net7 workload changes #74018
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix ABI for Int128 #73601
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Workload changes - account for SDK bands and use archives #73981
    area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable workloads on arm64 #27243
  • "GetPackageDirectory" task failing unexpectedly #27239
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the Specified RuntimeIdentifier'browser-wasm' #27238
  • Solution-Wide publish profiles #27222

Closed

  • Package validation not working when PackageId is used #23393
  • [Package Validation] Add support for multiple assemblies in the package. #17364

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27245
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1950503 #27244
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27241
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use Logger and apply fix in AssemblyIdentity rule #27233
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add solution filter for template engine #27229
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet new: switched telemetry to use `TelemetryEventEntry` #27223
    area: dotnet new

Merged

  • Port predownload changes into .3xx #27209
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Loc fix in ApiCompat #27194
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Support multiple unique assembly ids in packages and tasks #27203
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Support loading assembly references when multiple assemblies are passed to the AssemblySymbolLoader #27237
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Stop double copying all of the watch and format files. #26811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27214
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support directories and globs as lefts and rights #27197
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1948772 #27225
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Support multiple Windows SDK versions for different TFMs #27207

Updated

  • Port predownload changes into 6.0.1xx #27208
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port pre-download changes into the 6.0.4xx branch #27178
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Lock net5 sdk packages #27179
    Area-NetSDK
  • Handle error when status runtime information cannot find version in productCollection. #26676
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Blazor WASM Baselines for new files #27201
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove custom logic of fetching dotnet dir #26851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Migrated to newest version of `FluentAssertions` #27132
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #27193
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • String-based enums #2849

PullRequests

Created

  • Add RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #6382

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a CanApplyChanges api to CodeFixContext and CodeRefactoringContext #63457
  • Rename doesn't work on the properties associated with positional parameters/primary constructor parameters in records #63455
  • EditorConfig Template description should be updated from `default` to `empty` #63452
  • Remove Newtonsoft.Json package reference from eng/InternalTools.props #63450
  • Assert failure in Binder.CheckValue() compiling discarded ref assignment #63446
  • `IDE0055` diagnostic reported for pattern with opening parenthesis followed by relational operator #63445
  • IDE0045 produce invalid code #63441
  • Deprecate all public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #63440

Closed

  • MethodNotFoundException when running RoslynDeployment on main #63258
    Backlog
  • Convert to 'Program.Main' should preserve staticness of Program class #62943
    17.4
  • Convert to 'Program.Main' with `file partial class Program` #62437
    Backlog
  • MoveTypeCodeRefactoringProvider when trying to move struct from interface to separate cs file #63114
    17.4
  • `CSharpSyntaxGenerator.AsInterfaceMember` fails for nested types in interfaces #60708
    Backlog
  • UTF8 multiline raw string literals don't show left column guide in the IDE #63428
  • Using Source Generator occurs a weird building error #63418
  • Dereference of ref field should be emitted to IL even if value is ignored #62122
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify File-Rename code #63456
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused argument #63454
    Area-IDE
  • Inline local in Program.Main refactoring #63451
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve cross-project add-using results #63449
    Area-IDE
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Do symbol mapping in Go To Def #63439
    Area-IDE
  • Move symbol-cache incremental-analyzer out of oop. #63438
    Area-IDE
  • Add assert back #63437
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handle nested non-deconstruction conversions in DeconstructionInfo #63435
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fetch the recoverable tree length option more lazily #63155
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable adding attributes to generic types #63292
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use existing Program class declaration in "Convert to 'Program.Main'" refactoring when possible #63276
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix moving nested type to another file from an interface #63274
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Enable UTF8 raw multiline column guides #63443
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure all ref local and field value access are dereferenced #63432
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Add telemetry for the time and files outputted for source generators #63088
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Update CodeAnalysis.Testing dependency #63416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63406
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve OutputCaching vary-by API #43355
  • Remove blocking APIs in asp.net core integration tests code #43353
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, json #43350
  • SignalR client-to-server streaming method on Hub not recognized as streaming unless return type contains stream parameter #43347
  • Why does ForwardedHeadersMiddleware remove headers from the request?! #43344
  • Visual Studio/ Blazor - resx files improperly nested under razor.cs #43342
  • System.NullReferenceException: at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_HasFormContentType #43339
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #43338
  • Create Angular/React 7.0/6.0 project and use the command line to run project, the browser page always displays "Launching the spa proxy...“. #43335

Closed

  • Host grpc service in iis or as an app service? #9020
    Discussions
  • Blazor :Code doesn't compile following official documentation #42710
    Backlog
  • Testserver doesn't validate dependency injection as a normal host server #43217
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext #43314
  • Support authenticate attribute to specify authN schemes for controllers or method #42163
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43354
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Fix endpoints in StaticFileAuth sample #43352
    area-security, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43336
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove enable HTTP/3 client option #43282
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • Add QUIC event source logging to flakey test #43281
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Increase Kestrel's default HTTP/2 upload window sizes #43324
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 7.0-rc1
  • Exclusively use Azure (public) feeds #43303
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • Move badges to under header to match runtime's README #43348
    community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc2 #43240
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0-rc2

Updated

  • Support LF request line terminator in HttpParser #43202
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #43329
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Cancel client results after a default timeout (and fix cancel closing connection) #43249
    area-signalr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add support for running final conventions during build #43225
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix resolving method declaration in separate file #43323
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Store and reuse client certificate task #43270
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Only create context if an event is set #43211
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot Upload MAUI Archive to Apple App Store #9507
  • [Mac Catalyst] Geolocation.GetLocationAsync() is null in MacOs #9506
  • On Windows some controls won't show image icons #9502
  • When developing maui apps ,application toolbar missing. #9501
  • Unable to activate Windows Store app - The parameter is incorrect #9500
  • .Net Maui Preferences.Get Returns Null instead of defaultValue on Windows Machine #9499
  • .NET MAUI installation bug: The target platform identifier android/ios/maccatalyst was not recognized #9498
  • Messed up Appearing/Disappearing events in Maui Pages #9497
  • .NET MAUI Picker ItemsSource binding failed #9496
  • MAUI Flyout page leaves visual artefact on Android when changing pages #9495
  • Why does System.IO.Directory.Exists return false when viewing Mac path in .net Maui? #9494
  • Cant add a variable to Grid rows more than once. #9493
  • Render Menuitems in the Shell as disabled if a command’s CanExecute returns false #9492
  • Unable to publish WPF Blazor app if I have a razor class with code behind and override OnInitialize and choose self contained #9491
  • VerticalScrollBarVisibility not working on Android #9489
  • [BUG ] The namespace is not being adhered to for the new content pages being created. #9488
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.manifest-6.0.300.msi.x64::6.0.9 is not found in NuGet feeds" #9486
  • [Android] Slow scrolling, laggy performance #9485
  • [Windows] Converter not found #9484
  • [Windows] Differences using Layouts between Windows and other platforms #9483
  • ios lanunch confront black screen #9482
  • Spaces in image names in a shared Razor Class Library cause the image to not load #9481

Closed

  • [iOS] Localisation not working #7362
  • Make Microsoft.Maui.Platform.MauiWKWebView.CreateConfiguration() method to "protect virtual" instead of "private staic" #9429
    .NET 7
  • DataGrid standard control #9479

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9509
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr5
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9508
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 7.0-rc1

Merged

  • [.NET 6] [Blazor] Account for Maui multi-rid builds (#9348) #9393

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9480
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add ctors to MauiMKWebView #9441

Updated

  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477

    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reduce repeating parameters #28768
  • ExecuteUpdate: support partial updating inside JSON documents #28766
  • Replacing Owned Entity that contains an enum value with .HasConversion<string> throws exception during SaveChanges #28763
  • ExecuteUpdate: allow value tuples in setters for expressing row values #28761

Closed

  • Validate that no properties on an entity type are mapped to the same column #26263
    7.0.0
  • SqlServer: add custom convention which adds a blank trigger to all tables #27531
    7.0.0
  • Support for lists of primitives in EF with CosmosDb, support Guids #28762
  • SQL Server uniquifies index names globally, when only per-table is needed #27651
    7.0.0
  • Uniquify and validate FK, Key and index names across tables #23144
    7.0.0
  • Scaffold Specific table is SQL DB does not generate HasKey(Fluent) or [Key] Annotation. #28758
  • Validate that GetContainingPropertyName() is null iff IsDocumentRoot() #27342
    7.0.0-rc2
  • CSharpHelper: support more types of collection literals #19274
    7.0.0-rc2
  • ExecuteUpdate: Convert query with unsupported operations #28661
    7.0.0-rc1

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge rc1 to release #28765
  • Validate that no properties on an entity type are mapped to the same column #28759
  • ExecuteDelete: Generate correct Contains method when query has unsupp… #28755
    tell-mode
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' into release/7.0 #28764
    type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Add a custom convention which adds a blank trigger to all tables #28749
    tell-mode
  • Uniquify FK and Key constraint names across tables #28753
    providers-beware
  • Validate that GetContainingPropertyName() is null iff IsDocumentRoot() #28760
  • Add support for CSharpHelper for Dictionary literals #28330
    auto-merge
  • Merge 7.0-rc1 to 7.0 #28757

Updated

  • feat: normalize migrations file #28367
